oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Inside Nashville various interviews - John Padgett
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of interviews with Roy Acuff (performer), Skeeter Davis (performer), Rosie Clooney (performer), and Billy Grammer (performer), conducted by John Padgett, for Inside Nashville news on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Roy Acuff talks about how they classify John Denver as a country artist -- Acuff talks about the war in Vietnam and as a Christian, how hurt he is by it on both sides -- John Padgett concludes the interview -- Skeeter Davis talks about being back on the Grand Ole Opry at the new facility -- Skeeter Davis talks about the atmosphere being different in the new facility -- Skeeter Davis talks about classifying Olivia Newton John as a contemporary artist -- Skeeter Davis talks about genre being a different perspective for everyone -- John Padgett concludes the interview -- Rosie Clooney talks about being back on the Grand Ole Opry at the new facility -- Clooney talks about disliking labels and that she thinks Olivia Newton John is a great singer and a great person -- John Padgett concludes the interview -- Billy Grammer talks about not approving of explicit content in the lyrical aspect of modern country music -- Grammer talks about having Christian values in and out of his music -- Grammer talks about classifying John Denver as a country artist -- Grammer talks about classifying Olivia Newton John as whatever she portrays herself as -- Padgett concludes the interview
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Davis, Skeeter; Acuff, Roy, 1903-1992; Grammer, Billy
